Filter1, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
get_subontology_from, filters out all proteins in the input protein list of interest that are annotated as "extracellular region" and "lysosome" and "plasma membrane" excluding "extracellular organelle" and "cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane"
comp1, tp_cut_tool, Extracts uniprot accessions from all proteins in the input list that are predicted by WolfPsort to be lysosomal and/or extracellular.

term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
get_subontology_from, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
term_id_vs_term_name, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside in lysosomes.
Filter1, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
get_subontology_from, bg_uniq, wolf_psort, uniprot, tp_easyjoin_tool, Removes comment lines at the head of the Uniprot Go database file.
